founders that are building in your specific sector or at the same stage in a quiet setting. It’s a great place to share experiences and ask for tips on how to handle different situations as a founder – and hopefully by the end of this session you will have a strong group chat built, which you can always go back to and ask for help.

title=”Will I need my Startup Pass to enter the event?”][vc_column_text]You need to have both your badge and wristband to access Founders Day.

You can exchange your ticket for a badge and wristband at any of our Pre-badge claim points before the event. See locations and opening hours below.

Elisa Kulma

Aleksanterinkatu 19, 00100 Helsinki

  • Mon, Nov 27, 12 pm–7 pm
  • Tue, Nov 28, 12 pm–7 pm
  • Wed, Nov 29, 11 am–8 pm

ISKU Showroom

Kalevankatu 4, 00100 Helsinki

  • Mon, Nov 27, 12 pm–8 pm
  • Tue, Nov 28, 12 pm–8 pm
  • Wed, Nov 29, 9 am–8 pm

The Helsinki-Vantaa Airport

Arrivals Hall, Promootioaukio 01531 Vantaa

  • Tue, Nov 28, 8 am–9 pm
  • Wed, Nov 29, 8 am–10 pm

This Pre-badge Claim point is accessible.

Mall of Tripla

Fredikanterassi 1, 00520 Helsinki

  • Tue, Nov 28, 12 pm–8 am
  • Wed, Nov 29, 10 am–9 pm

This Pre-badge Claim point is accessible.

Oodi, Central Library

Töölönlahdenkatu 4, 00100 Helsinki

  • Wed, Nov 29, 9 am–8 pm

This Pre-badge Claim point is accessible.

Please note: You will be asked to present a pictured ID when picking up your badge and wristband for safety reasons.

Badge Claim is also available upon your arrival at the main event venue, Messukeskus, during the event days. We have Badge claim points at both the Southern and the Northern entrances.

We strongly recommend getting your badge and wristband in advance from the Pre-badge Claim to avoid queuing.
